mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT V.ID, V.MEMBER_ID, V.VIDEO_TITLE, V.VIDEO_CONTENT, V.VIDEO_LINK, V.VIDEO_VIEW_COUNT, V.VIDEO_WRITE_TIME, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL, M.MEMBER_IMG_NAME, M.MEMBER_IMG_PATH, ( SELECT COUNT(L.VIDEO_ID) FROM TBL_LIKE_VIDEO L WHERE L.VIDEO_ID = V.ID ) AS LIKE_COUNT, ( SELECT COUNT(R.VIDEO_ID) FROM TBL_VIDEO_REPLY R WHERE R.VIDEO_ID = V.ID ) AS REPLY_COUNT FROM TBL_VIDEO V JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON V.MEMBER_ID = M.ID WHERE V.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY V.VIDEO_WRITE_TIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
